Northland loses legendary kiwi Sir Ed to ferret attack https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-loses-legendary-kiwi-sir-ed/PHHQ4CGGVJCG7BRC7ZALMQNNAE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-loses-legendary-kiwi-sir-ed/PHHQ4CGGVJCG7BRC7ZALMQNNAE/ Sarah CurtisA 20-year-old kiwi, father to numerous offspring, has been found dead on Matakohe Island. Fri, 13 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Legendary Northland kiwi Sir Ed is dead but his offspring live on. Sir Ed was known to have fathered at least 10 chicks during his 20 years on Matakohe Island, an ecosanctuary in the Whangārei Harbour. Two of them are pictured here.
